entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
